original_title: Pasajero: A Journey of Time and Memory
overview: This documentary follows a group of young Mexican-American musicians who leave the inner city to join their music teacher Juli√°n Gonzalez -- an aging violinist -- on a trip to his hometown in the Mexican state of Jalisco, where mariachi was born. Once there, the performers encounter a host of captivating characters and become acquainted with their musical roots in a new way, connecting with a purer, pre-commercial style of mariachi.
title: Pasajero: A Journey of Time and Memory
